description:
go.tools/go/types: fewer guarantees in case of type errors

Provide fewer guarantees regarding the collected result
type information in types.Info if there are type errors.

Specifically, don't record nil objects in the Objects map
in case of a declaration error; instead, simply omit them.

messages.text:
Hello adonovan@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2d447f803f2f&repo=tools ***

go.tools/go/types: fewer guarantees in case of type errors

Provide fewer guarantees regarding the collected result
type information in types.Info if there are type errors.

Specifically, don't record nil objects in the Objects map
in case of a declaration error; instead, simply omit them.

TBR=adonovan
